name: Creative Computing Board Games 1
overview: Creative Computing Board Games-1 is a compilation of several games for TRS-80: * Backgammon - A version of the classic game, programmed by Scott Adams * Qubic - a 4-D Tic Tac Toe implementation * Flip Disc - an Othello/Reversi implementation * Wumpus I and Wumpus II - two versions of Hunt the Wumpus * Mugwump - the classic type-in BASIC game
